Third-Party Risk Management Best Practices

This guide provides expert advice for an effective and efficient third-party risk management program, covering best practices in onboarding, ongoing monitoring, inherent risk management, residual risk review cadences, and external help. The document aims to showcase modern TPRM best practices and provide valuable insights for companies looking to mature their TPRM processes.

Key Concepts:

  • Effective Program
  • Efficient Process
  • Automated Processes
  • Risk Mitigation
  • Program Maturity
  • Vendor Service Reviews
  • Service Level Agreements
  • Third-Party Risk Management
